title: Math Camp 2024

Acknowledgments

title: Introduction
text:
You can find the course syllabus and material from classes here.
Classes would take place between 9 - 4 pm in ICC 234.
This week will learn two things:

Some Maths
Some Programming on R

Both of these parts are meant to be introductory/review preparing you for basic fluency in quantitative tools that would come in handy in different courses.
This website would largely concern with material on R and LaTeX. We would use RStudio for working with these.

title: Day 1
text:
Software Session
We will be getting started with the following installations today:

R - Statistical Programming Language
RStudio - Interactive Development Environment for R
Stata - Statistical Software Package (the “other” one)
Zotero - Reference Management Tool
GitHub - Storing code online with version control


R and R Studio
Use the link here to install RStudio on your systems.


Stata
Stata is a paid software. Georgetown provides download option through the university webstore here.


Zotero
Zotero is a reference management tools. It allows you to maintain a structured bibliography. Its integration with various web browsers and software like MS Word and R, makes it a fantastic tool for keeping track of readings as well as citing them.





Zotero Folder





Make Zotero Account.
Add a connector to the browser (For eg, zotero connector for google chrome).
Download Zotero Desktop App here.
Connect Zotero to R Studio. (We will do this step on Day 5, using the link here).



GitHub
Make your account here
